home.instruction: This app is meant as an example of how you can change the language as a setting. The app remembers the language setting and uses the same language when the app restarts later.

about.title: Additional screen
about.explanation: This screen uses no redux and is not connected to the 'settings store'. It just listens to the I18n plugin and its 'locale' parameter. We can do this here because this screen is not rendered on startup (unlike the Welcome screen) and not shown when switching languages (unlike the Settings screen).
